lenders.name: John

lenders.name: candice

lenders.occupational_info: I am college instructor at a private college. I teach computer technology and business courses to a diverse population of adult learners.

lenders.name: Bolton Family

Our children participate in the selection of the person to lend to so they can feel that they have made a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Very interesting, I work in a firm that designs control systems for trains.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a stay at home mom.  I spend my time taking care of my 10 month old daughter and 2 year old son.

lenders.loan_because: Its not about the loaning but about helping others around the world take strides forward in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work a part-time and it doesn't pay much, but I know there are others who need it more than I do.

lenders.name: Kiara
lenders.loan_because: It's a duty!

lenders.name: Nikhil
lenders.loan_because:
I believe there could not be anything better than helping someone who is willing to give his/her full efforts.
I like people who amidst all troubles are willing to take step forward and optimistic about creating new solutions.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working in a research labs for diagnosis of diseases

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a shot.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs, start-ups and global businesses implement successful online marketing strategies.

lenders.name: FDL Team
lenders.loan_because: We want to give back to other small business owners around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a global group of small business owners focusing on fashion and design.

lenders.name: Karen Collacutt
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of Pay It Forward - and with Kiva I can do it again and again for people I would never be able to access on my own.  I teach my clients about an attitude of gratitude and Kiva is a great way for us to give back.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with families who make good money and who wonder at the end of the month where their money went.
They are living the life of their dreams but secretly fear that their money avoidance has created a financial mess they can't recover from.
When they work with me they stop the constant worry and start enjoying their life and money, confident and in control off their future.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I love paying it forward and appreciate all life has to offer.  Since these loans can significantly improve families' lives, it pays rewards to all.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell TV shows to cable networks in the US.

lenders.name: Konstantin
lenders.loan_because: My dad started a small business when we lived in Ukraine. I know that had he received a loan similar to the ones Kiva provides, he would have achieved even more than he did. Now, I can help people like my dad reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Vintage Blue
lenders.loan_because:
Vintage Blue strives to support people in all aspects of life in need and encourages people to make a positive change.  We want to give our customers a say in which they want to support, so we have decided to let our customers donate 5% of their purchase to different organizations.

Vintage Blue believes and supports what KIVA is about and what it is doing for individuals in the developing world. We are honored to have the opportunity to offer to our customers the option to donate to KIVA
lenders.occupational_info:
Vintage Blue is a vintage-inspired sportswear line for women that holds the exclusive license to the All American Girls Professional Baseball League, featured in the movie “A League of Their Own” starring Madonna and Tom Hanks.  Vintage Blue considers itself a timeless brand that produces high quality garments using eco-friendly fabrics and dyes.  The company has and will continue to pursue licensing opportunities and draw inspiration from various sports genres throughout the eras.

Not only does Vintage Blue produce chemical-free garments, but it is a sustainable company in all aspects using eco-friendly materials when creating items like line sheets/catalogues, hang tags and more.

Vintage Blue is a socially conscience company donating 5% of profits to various organizations, implementing an internship program which fosters self esteem and garners opportunity to grow with the company to motivated young women, and creating campaigns that encourages people to make a positive change.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: micro-lending is the best way devised to end poverty.  I've found that in life if you want something to happen its best to do it yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: Arduous and expensive...learning.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: We all  need each other.  We have to help each other.  Peace is possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher, but burned out from stress.  Am now unemployed and trying to find a new direction in life.  Helping others helps me see the point in living.

lenders.name: Robi
lenders.loan_because: I love the stories!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that raises money to improve national park areas in the San Francisco Bay Area.

lenders.name: Pennie
lenders.loan_because: I don't need everything that I have and I want to share it with people that don't have what they need.

lenders.name: Ian & Kate

lenders.occupational_info: I retired some time ago.

lenders.occupational_info: Our church is committed to working for peace in our city, nation and world.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with investors to help them make intelligent decisions.

lenders.name: Sara-Linnéa

lenders.name: Lee-Ann Steenkamp

lenders.occupational_info: Instilling a passion for the work I'm lecturing on and encouraging my students to follow their God-given dreams and talents!

lenders.name: Angelika + Lothar
lenders.occupational_info: Pensioner

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: ... this little step I do may help someone to jump forward in life.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: My life is abundant and I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I design decorative flags for people to display outside of their homes.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to be empowered and encourage economic development in poorer parts of the world. Loans are a covenant to ensure investment generates measurable economic growth over the repayment period, or serve to reward those who are able to generate consistent income by improving their quality of life. The gains made by someone receiving a loan are not gifts from the lender, but entirely earned by the borrower. The culture created by borrowing and carefully managing debt is constructive to development.
lenders.occupational_info: I make games that are played using computers. I love to see people entertained -- no matter how good or bad life gets, there is always room to play games, to escape from their daily life for a time. I provide people with that opportunity.

lenders.name: Wim Leers
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world :)

lenders.name: Carol

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Satisfying...I feel fortunate to do what I like.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people live a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in grade 8, I'm a ballerina aswell as a violinist. I enjoy art, math, reading, writing, being with friends, listening to music, camping, kayaking, scuba diving, swimming, backpacking, going on adventures and volleyball :)

lenders.loan_because: I built up my business from scratch so I respect all these entrepreneurs and want to help those who have less than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I am partner with my wife Joy in a small business designing and making printed circuit boards.  I work in the technical department while Joy takes care of office management and finances.

I work for a large entertainment company's Internet site as a writer -- I write stories, polls, game copy, and whatever other text might be needed. 

My husband is a musician and artist, and works for a company that makes microphones.

lenders.occupational_info: Alot of the Samoan churchs need uniforms for church, I've been helping alot of these churches in doing that by printing their logos on materials (fabrics) then having them sewn with manufacturers so I can give them a good deal.  I love helping people and decided to make this into a business.

lenders.name: Agung
lenders.loan_because: God loves me and everyone on this earth very much. God is very generous and everything belongs to Him. I want to be a good steward of His money.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide accounting service to Hedge Fund managers and the goal is to prevent fraud within the fund. Madoff's scam will not work if he hired third party service like my company. The goal is that investors can be confident that their money is invested properly.

lenders.name: Miss Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped, and I want to help others have better opportunities too.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach reading comprehension and effective writing skills to American sixteen year olds.

lenders.name: Shauna
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in need and what it means to have someone's help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm training to be a family doctor.

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because:
I need a loan person to person, I have serious problems with my Renting and a beautiful child of 5 years, I need the money to afford the move and the coupling of the new house, I have stable work and paypal account, but I do not have the means to achieve money in another way.
is that there are even good-hearted people in this world, only hope that God guide someone to my request. I need 200 or 250 dollars.

Thanks
lenders.occupational_info: Stable, working in an airline, not earn much but enough to live.

lenders.name: Proficiency Systems
lenders.loan_because: We want to support entrepreneurship and help individuals lead their way out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company helps clients get the most from their processes, to better meet the needs of their customers and shareholders.

lenders.name: KiMM!E
lenders.loan_because: I'm too broke to give it away.

lenders.name: Theresa & Thomas
lenders.loan_because: We believe in people.
lenders.occupational_info: Theresa works with computers at a university.  Thomas does many things, from massage therapy to painting houses.

lenders.name: In Memory of Theo
lenders.loan_because: We started this account on Aug 15, 2008 the day that would have been our son Theo's second birthday. He passed away on May 28, 2008. He was a beautiful and mighty baby who overcame many medical challenges. We want to keep his loving spirit alive by making the world a better place in small ways. We love you Theo.

lenders.name: Sam and Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: We feel so lucky in life and we want to help other people feel the same way
lenders.occupational_info: Sam - an environmental attorney that works to ensure the integrity of our nations water and Elizabeth - an elementary school teacher that molds young minds

lenders.name: Jeff & Alice
lenders.loan_because: It seems to us that the best way to help people is to help them succeed at what they are already doing.  Let the direction of help come from them first.  If they can walk, we'd like to help them run.
lenders.occupational_info: Alice teaches children who are 5 to 6 years old.  Jeff works at a bank (not Kiva related), helping with the forms required to lend money to our local farmers and businessmen.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Using microfinance to invest in other people’s dreams is very rewarding for me.  To give the opportunity where there was none is what it’s all about.  One by one we will make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: Identify problems; identify potential solutions;  match the best solution to the problem.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: i want to help the people that have ambitions to better themselves and their way of living.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs some help sometime.

lenders.name: ness
lenders.loan_because: i believe in the long term benefits (both economic and cultural) of microlending.  i think microlending is an elegant and sustainable solution that helps the right people in the right ways.
lenders.occupational_info: i (my company) helps other companies do better business by giving them better technology

lenders.name: Ven.
lenders.loan_because: At some time in all our lives, each of us needs help. At other times, when we ourselves are fortunate, we can in turn help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Buddhist nun who lectures and writes books on Buddhism.

lenders.name: Solé

lenders.occupational_info: I help people with serious conflicts- so they can work together to resolve their differences.

lenders.name: Bethanie

lenders.name: Mahesh

lenders.name: Rebekah

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: micro finance is an empowering and honouring way for people to move towards financial independence, and lending to people feels such a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investor in innovative green and clean tech start-up companies  addressing climate change, resource depletion and bio-diversity loss. I also offer hospitality on a beautiful old motor yacht.

lenders.name: Richard

lenders.name: John and Xavier
lenders.loan_because: I think that with access to resources, people will find much more innovative solutions to their problems than traditional aid programs allow.

lenders.occupational_info: I study tropical rainforests and teach students science and ecology.

As a life coach I inspire people to find their passion in life and achieve their dreams

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I do admire all your courage to start a business under such difficult circumstances. May it work out well, good luck to all of you!

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because:
The best investment we can make is in helping each other. 
Peace to all!
lenders.occupational_info: Metrology is the science of measurement - I use high-tech equipment to measure manufactured parts to verify the parts are made to my company's specifications, which helps to ensure the integrity & quality of our product. I currently work in robotic automation, which is fascinating!

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: J.C. told us to love our neighbors as we love ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair and make new windows for my customers who own old houses.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: It might help people to improve their life. I like my job and if I can help someone to do what he likes while creating an activity, then I am happy with that.
lenders.occupational_info: I like sailing and music and overall, I like living in this world.

lenders.name: Friends of "Eckhard"

Best regards from Germany!

lenders.name: vikash
lenders.loan_because: I am a pooar persion and i want to work with you therefor i want Loan
lenders.occupational_info: through Internet and cellphone

lenders.name: Sayaka Sawada
lenders.occupation: Farming, translation, guest house, MSF log
lenders.loan_because: I feel how fortunate and privileged I am to be born in this country, to receive education and lead a decent life - I have invested enough for myself and feel it is time at my age to make ROI to the society for what I have received to support people who are in less fortunate circumstances to achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: involved with multi-tasks: translation, interpretation, sales & marketing, consulting, some writing, organizing events

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: microlending is the most direct way in which I feel I can make a difference in the life of fellow members of my species somewhere else on this precious planet. Specifically, I honor and celebrate those who have given me a chance by reaching out and extending a hand to others.
lenders.occupational_info: By trade I am neuroscientist who studies the basic mechanisms of neurological disorders such as Parkinson's, and drug addiction. For as long as I remember, however, I have also been an activist for environmental issues. I spend a lot of my spare time working in environmental education where we have converted an old farmstead into a conservation and restoration area. We work with kids at local schools to teach them the value of natural resources and ways to use them in a sustainable fashion. We help the community raise vegetables locally, offer workshops in beekeeping, and facilitate a seed business for native prairie wildflowers.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Enabling others to make a positive change in their lives, giving someone hope and support, letting them know that they and their efforts matter in this world - even to someone thousands of miles away. Every voice should be heard and empowering people is the best way to make a difference. One life at a time, one success at a time. Everyone deserves a chance in life, and I would encourage everyone able to, to please "pay it forward" any way you can. It is what living on this planet is about and every good turn is rewarded by another - its just up to someone to kick up the first ripple.....

lenders.name: Gareth
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see an improvement in peoples quality of life.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: Becasue what ever we do to the least of the people that we do for Him.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now and visit the sick at there homes, and bring them the love of my church.

lenders.name: Ursula
lenders.loan_because:
I feel fortunate and happy. 
Therefore I want to share my privileges with others.
Love and happiness for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am selfemployed in my travel office.
My work is to find vacationhomes, hotels, etc. on the beautiful island of Mallorca, which is part of Spain.

lenders.name: Kiser Middle School
lenders.loan_because: it gives us a chance to learn about,connect with, and give a helping hand to people from all parts of the world. This is our up-close lesson in globalization.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students and teachers, parents and friends.

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: I am aware of the struggles of those in deep poverty, and want to reach out to those working to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer.  I used to work in Public Accounting, and have worked as a musician.

lenders.name: Wayne, Kate and Yasmin
lenders.loan_because: It is great to see people helping themselves, so lending is a way to encourage self help.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: People... are people.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn and teach mathematics.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I know how much my loans mean to the people they help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to keep Facebook working.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing the opportunity, promotion, education and treatment to guide individuals toward health, happiness and well-being through traditional Chinese medicine modalities.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me; I want to help others.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hard working honest people a chance to get ahead. I love that these loans are interest free and allow people to retain there dignity knowing that someone believes in them enough to make the money available to them not as a handout. I own my own company and work very hard to make it successful, I know sometimes hard work needs a little capital to make the success happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I use the computer to design advertising brochures, manuals, art, postcards, company logos and letterheads.

lenders.name: Karyl
lenders.loan_because: a little bit here can help out a lot there.

lenders.name: Malachi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I love to help support individuals helping themselves, building their life, and taking care of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that builds wind energy projects in Spain, the US, UK and around the world.  In my free time I also volunteer for Kiva translating Spanish language loans.

lenders.name: Trevor Ivory
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way of directly helping those less fortunate than me and my help is more than just aid, it offers people the opportunity to imrpove their lives and lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the candidate for the Conservative Party for the parliamentary constituency of North Norfolk.

lenders.name: Gary and Amanda
lenders.loan_because: this is just an awesome thing to do, if you're able to give small loans.  This is one great program.
lenders.occupational_info: Sit behind a computer 5 days a week, maintaining and updating a few different Network screens.  Sometimes calling hospitals to dispute bills our insureds' are receiving.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: women everywhere should support one another
lenders.occupational_info: I write about food, restaurants, and people I know.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because:
There should be no poverty in this world.
Every individual who has a motivation to help themselves, their families and communities ought to be helped to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with lots of people from different parts of the world.

lenders.name: Steph & Derek
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the power and intelligence of self determination en route to a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife helps build things and I teach people how to heal.

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have family support in times of need and I want to give a little in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the payroll and do the bookeeping for a law firm

lenders.name: Dan and Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the people I am helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a wonderful charter school, KIPP (Knowledge is Power Program), and my wife teaches at YES Prep (Youth Engaged in Service).

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people grow up to better lives and not be so poor
lenders.occupational_info: I would describe my work as building a better community and stuff like that

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to support people wanting to improve their lives!

lenders.name: A.L. Schwartz
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to those who want to succeed, and to share in the bounty I have in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: Theft and fire investigator

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: Because I can
lenders.occupational_info: Hair salon owner

lenders.name: lisbeth west
lenders.loan_because:
every dollar means new life for a Kiva recipient  who does not have my privilege. Today (March 8) is International Women's Day and I am pledging to add Kiva to my charities for 2009-2010. I have lived with a disability all of my life and I have lived in poverty for much of my adult life. 

I am now in the position to share my wealth: My pledge to myself was "The first year I make over 10K in one year I must help another person." 2008 was that year.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and edit poetry and fiction. I am an artist and a photographer and live in the mountains of Colorado. My barnyard has chickens, ducks, geese and a white peacock in it. They remind me every day of how precious life is for all.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Wow- SO many reasons... I guess being fortunate enough to be able to do so, and helping those with a lot of ambition. We are all in this together:)
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for patients, working with a very talented, caring medical team.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: It is exciting to help someone help themself.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: KivaMan
lenders.loan_because: Start-up capital is the single most-powerful means to improve the lives of people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to develop solutions to very human problems and offer them to folks in need with a smile and a firm handshake.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a senior at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and a musician.

lenders.name: Srini
lenders.loan_because: As an individual it's a low risk way of improving GDP and the standard of living of people across nations by effecting substantive change at the bottom of the pyramid - helping the World's working poor.
lenders.occupational_info: As a management consultant I advise companies on how to improve their operations so they can grow profitably and be a sustainable enterprise.
